Tooltip: Uses a given application card and a given ui element from which it takes the screenshot's element pixels, in order to check if they match the given image path's color code and it returns the match result as a boolean.

Arguments.Name: ApplicationPath
Arguments.Tooltip: The path to the web or desktop application.

Arguments.Name: UiElement
Arguments.Tooltip: The Ui element that needs to match the expected image

Arguments.Name: MatchResult
Arguments.Tooltip: The match result between the ui element and the expected image.

Arguments.Name: ApplicationSelector
Arguments.Tooltip: The selector to the web or desktop application.

Arguments.Name: ExpectedImageFilePath
Arguments.Tooltip: The file path to the expected image result.
